title: I hate the Summoners Rift loading screen.
body:
This has been something that has been bothering me for quite some time, i thought that it might just be my computer but after talking with some friends they saw the same thing too.

The loading screen when getting into a match looks like this.
https://gyazo.com/de4259d6526681594018a99b5538dd1f

I want to know why there is a black spec above the V on VS, it seems so out of place when there arent any other black specs around it
https://gyazo.com/04ac211d7fd15aadf3714777e31e52e1

replies.body: Now that I've seen it, I'm going to notice it every time and it's going to trigger me until it's fixed.
Thanks for pointing that out, bugs me every time I load in now lol

Literally unplayable.
*
*
*
*


XD Seriously though, I never noticed that. I think it's more likely to be an issue with the game display rather than the actual picture.
Have never noticed that before. To be honest I don't even bother looking at the loading screen half the time, I'm usually just on my phone lol
